com.redhat.rhn.manager.errata
Class ErrataManager

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.manager.BaseManager
      com.redhat.rhn.manager.errata.ErrataManager

public class ErrataManager
extends BaseManager

ErrataManager is the singleton class used to provide business operations on Errata, where those operations interact with other top tier business objects. Operations that require changes to the Errata.

Method Detail

resolveOvalFiles

public static java.util.List resolveOvalFiles(java.util.List errataFiles)
Converts a list of ErrataFile instances into java.io.File instances If a corresponding java.io.File instance is not found for a given ErrataFile instance then it is skipped and not added to the returned list.

Parameters:
errataFiles - list of files to resolve
Returns:
list of corresponding java.io.File instances

publish

public static Errata publish(Errata unpublished,
                             java.util.Set channelIds,
                             User user)
Takes an unpublished errata and returns a published errata into the channels we pass in. NOTE: This method will commit the transaction in order to allow the async call to update the errata cache to be able to have the proper data

Parameters:
unpublished - The errata to publish
channelIds - The Long channelIds we want to publish this Errata to.
user - who is publishing errata
Returns:
Returns a published errata.

advisoryNameIsUnique

public static boolean advisoryNameIsUnique(java.lang.Long eid,
                                           java.lang.String name)
Sees if there is an errata with the same advisory name as the errata with eid

Parameters:
eid - The id of the errata you're checking
name - The advisory name you're checking
Returns:
Returns true if no other errata exists with the same advisoryName, false otherwise.
